tweet_text.176716: Flu Tip: If you have the flu make sure to drink plenty of water! See your GP too. You may need antiviral medications.
tweet_text.176763: RT: The flu shot can prevent severe flu complications in ppl w/ chronic conditions, such as heart disease NIAM14 http://t.co/O8igy…
tweet_text.176762: Are you prepared for a flu outbreak or pandemic? Check out these valuable planning resources for schools: http://t.co/FncnOVMUGp NIAM14
